excerpt: While AirPods are wildly popular and completely wireless, there’s a growing movement of people who like to use more traditional wired headphones instead of wireless, whether it’s with t…
text: While AirPods are wildly popular and completely wireless, there’s a growing movement of people who like to use more traditional wired headphones instead of wireless, whether it’s with their iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Many people even prefer the wired headphones over wireless for various reasons. Apple still produces the classic white wired Apple EarPods headphones in USB-C, Lightning, and 3.5mm AUX, and right now Amazon is offering nice little discounts on each of them. Whether your device uses USB-C (like iPhone 15 and newer), Lightning (like the iPhone 14 Pro and older), or AUX 3.5mm (any older iPhone, Mac, or iPad with an AUX headphone jack), Amazon has one for you at a nice little discount: Get EarPods Wired Headphones – Lightning – $15.96 (down from $19.99) Get EarPods Wired Headphones – USB-C – $16.99 (down from $19.99) Get EarPods Wired Headphones – AUX 3.5mm – $16.99 (down from $19.99) Once upon a time Apple included these nice white EarPods wired headphones with the purchase of every new iPhone, but just like they stopped filling the box with an included charger (LOL) they also stopped including headphones (cheap), so now you have to buy all of these accessories separately. Fortunately, Amazon often discounts Apple gear regularly, so if you wish you had some wired EarPods headphones, check them out. M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599) The M3 iPad Air might have just been released by Apple, but Amazon is already starting to offer a nice discount, taking 8% off the retail price. The latest iPad Air offers a powerful M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display (virtually flicker free for those with PWM sensitivity), 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in multiple color options. M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599 retail) iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499) Perhaps you’re seeking a smaller tablet? The iPad mini 7 is powerful and features the A17 processor with Apple Intelligence support, 8″ LCD display, a 12mp front and rear camera, 128 GB storage, USB-C charging, and support for optional Apple Pencil Pro. iPad mini is offered in multiple color options at this price: iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499) Pair with the Apple Pencil Pro, which is also available at a discount… Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129) Apple Pencil Pro is a popular addition to a compatible iPad, bringing gestures, haptics, magnetic attachment and charging, and super easy pairing. Apple Pencil Pro is compatible with iPad mini 7 (A17 Pro model), iPad Pro 13-inch (M4), iPad Air 13-inch (M2), and iPad Pro 11-inch (M4) . This is a popular iPad accessory, and with $30 off the retail price it’s a worthwhile accessory for many who like to write or doodle. Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 is great for fitness enthusiasts or anyone looking to keep track of they activity, it features an always-on 42mm display, fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more. Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running
html:
While AirPods are wildly popular and completely wireless, there’s a growing movement of people who like to use more traditional wired headphones instead of wireless, whether it’s with their iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Many people even prefer the wired headphones over wireless for various reasons. Apple still produces the classic white wired Apple EarPods headphones in USB-C, Lightning, and 3.5mm AUX, and right now Amazon is offering nice little discounts on each of them.

Whether your device uses USB-C (like iPhone 15 and newer), Lightning (like the iPhone 14 Pro and older), or AUX 3.5mm (any older iPhone, Mac, or iPad with an AUX headphone jack), Amazon has one for you at a nice little discount:

  • Get EarPods Wired Headphones – Lightning – $15.96 (down from $19.99)
  • Get EarPods Wired Headphones – USB-C – $16.99 (down from $19.99)
  • Get EarPods Wired Headphones – AUX 3.5mm – $16.99 (down from $19.99)

Once upon a time Apple included these nice white EarPods wired headphones with the purchase of every new iPhone, but just like they stopped filling the box with an included charger (LOL) they also stopped including headphones (cheap), so now you have to buy all of these accessories separately. Fortunately, Amazon often discounts Apple gear regularly, so if you wish you had some wired EarPods headphones, check them out.

M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599)

The M3 iPad Air might have just been released by Apple, but Amazon is already starting to offer a nice discount, taking 8% off the retail price. The latest iPad Air offers a powerful M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display (virtually flicker free for those with PWM sensitivity), 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in multiple color options.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599 retail)

iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

Perhaps you’re seeking a smaller tablet? The iPad mini 7 is powerful and features the A17 processor with Apple Intelligence support, 8″ LCD display, a 12mp front and rear camera, 128 GB storage, USB-C charging, and support for optional Apple Pencil Pro. iPad mini is offered in multiple color options at this price:

  • iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

Pair with the Apple Pencil Pro, which is also available at a discount…

Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129)

Apple Pencil Pro is a popular addition to a compatible iPad, bringing gestures, haptics, magnetic attachment and charging, and super easy pairing. Apple Pencil Pro is compatible with iPad mini 7 (A17 Pro model), iPad Pro 13-inch (M4), iPad Air 13-inch (M2), and iPad Pro 11-inch (M4) . This is a popular iPad accessory, and with $30 off the retail price it’s a worthwhile accessory for many who like to write or doodle.

  • Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is great for fitness enthusiasts or anyone looking to keep track of they activity, it features an always-on 42mm display, fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running
